ThingDef.label: constructing multi-arm
ThingDef.description: An advanced bionic gland which upon being implanted releases consistent waves of specially programmed nanomachines that transform the user's skin into a sort of natural chainmail, highly resistant to cuts and slices. The skin however becomes scaly and rough, making the user particularly unappealing.

HediffDef.label: constructor multi-arm
HediffDef.description: A fleshy, muscled tentacle resembling a partial transformation into a fleshbeast. The tentacle is excellent at manipulation.\n\nThe flesh tentacle has its own neural structures and may become dangerous if removed.

ThingDef.label: mining multi-arm
ThingDef.description: An advanced bionic gland which upon being implanted releases consistent waves of specially programmed nanomachines that transform the user's skin into a sort of natural chainmail, highly resistant to cuts and slices. The skin however becomes scaly and rough, making the user particularly unappealing.

HediffDef.label: miner multi-arm
HediffDef.description: A fleshy, muscled tentacle resembling a partial transformation into a fleshbeast. The tentacle is excellent at manipulation.\n\nThe flesh tentacle has its own neural structures and may become dangerous if removed.

ThingDef.label: crafting multi-arm
ThingDef.description: An advanced bionic gland which upon being implanted releases consistent waves of specially programmed nanomachines that transform the user's skin into a sort of natural chainmail, highly resistant to cuts and slices. The skin however becomes scaly and rough, making the user particularly unappealing.

HediffDef.label: crafter arm
HediffDef.description: A fleshy, muscled tentacle resembling a partial transformation into a fleshbeast. The tentacle is excellent at manipulation.\n\nThe flesh tentacle has its own neural structures and may become dangerous if removed.

ThingDef.label: ironskin former
ThingDef.description: An advanced bionic gland which upon being implanted releases consistent waves of specially programmed nanomachines that transform the user's skin into a sort of natural chainmail, highly resistant to cuts and slices. The skin however becomes scaly and rough, making the user particularly unappealing.

ThingDef.label: steelbone injector
ThingDef.description: A powerful bionic organ implanted within the base of the spine, once fully accepted by the body it meticulously begins releasing nanomachines and various chemical concoctions that reinforce the user's skeletal structure, making them tougher, heavier, and more resistant to blunt damages. Due to the added weight, it also lowers the speed of the user.

ThingDef.label: wrist flamer
ThingDef.description: A forearm replacement with a built-in short range flameblaster capable of firing a single burst of flame before needing to be reloaded. Due to it's size and utilitarian design, the replacement arm makes finer motor functions more difficult, lowering manipulation.

ThingDef.label: rocket fist
ThingDef.description: A hand and wrist replacement that gives the user the option for completely fire off their new metallic mitten to cause an explosion. The hand is large and well-armored, and it is filled with explosive material that, when fired, becomes volatile, making it effectively a pocket rocket launcher. The hand is large and hard to move, lowering general manipulation capabilities. The hand must obviously be reconstructed after every shot.

ThingDef.label: arm slugger
ThingDef.description: A complete arm replacement with an advanced set of barrels and complex auto-loaders that allows the user to fire a spread of small bullets at short range; underestimated by most, it is mainly effective against unarmored foes. The added heft of the arm and the simplistic, tough design make it harder for the user to move and to complete finer manipulation tasks. It can fire off 2 charges before needing to be reloaded with steel.

ThingDef.label: shock fist
ThingDef.description: A bionic hand replacement with a powerful built-in EMP capacitor capable of stunning mechanoids and turrets alike in a large radius, to be activated it needs to be punched into the ground, creating a powerful shockwave of EMP energy. Needs no reloading, but it takes a long time to fully recharge. The hand is rough and robust, mainly built to resist the impact, which makes it less useful for finer manipulation-related tasks.

ThingDef.label: prospector eye
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial eye. With its biogel nerve-link, internal signal pre-processor, and wide-spectrum sensors, it is better than a biological eye in almost every way. A lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage.

ThingDef.label: crystal eye
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial eye. With its biogel nerve-link, internal signal pre-processor, and wide-spectrum sensors, it is better than a biological eye in almost every way. A lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage.

ThingDef.label: barrier kit
ThingDef.description: A complete, heavy arm replacement that allows the user to throw 3 quick-deploy barriers in quick successsion; the barriers are waist-high and can be useful during shoot-outs and battles, after which they'll self-destruct giving back some resources. The bionic is large and simplistic, making it difficult to complete any manipulation tasks.
